law.catch_line: Pari-mutuel wagering exempt from KRS Ch. 528.
law.text: KRS Chapter 528 shall not apply to pari-mutuel wagering authorized under the provisions of KRS Chapter 230.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 183, sec. 7. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 327. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3914b-6.
